divs: Sighting DetailsI hate to burst the bubble of the enthusiasts in Phoenix monitoring the webcam, but the lights they are seeing with regularity are flares dropped by Air Force jets over the bombing range near Gila Bend, AZ, west of Phoenix(and just in the line of sight of the webcam). And it's entirely possible they may even be seeing rocket exhaust from the missles fired at the targets being illuminated by the flares. I spent several weeks on assignment in Gila Bend, AZ and witnessed these flares close up on several ocasions.
